entities.name: wilhelmina
entities.description: Professor Wilhelmina McGonagall is mentioned as interrupting Harry Potter. She says 'Just a moment, Wilhelmina!' which suggests that she knows someone by this name.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character in the story. He receives a letter and is being watched by Professor McGonagall.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl who has a scroll tied to her leg.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is a teacher at Hogwarts. She warns Harry about being watched and gives him a nod before leaving.

entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank hands over the scroll to Harry and then disappears into the staffroom with Hedwig.

relationships.description: Professor McGonagall warns Harry about being watched by channels of communication in and out of Hogwarts.
Hedwig is tied to Harry's leg with a scroll.
